title: BacAlarm: Mining and Simulating Composite API Traffic to Prevent Broken Access Control Violations
summary: Broken Access Control (BAC) violations, which consistently rank among the top five security risks in the OWASP API Security Top 10, refer to unauthorized access attempts arising from BAC vulnerabilities, whose successful exploitation can impose significant risks on exposed application programming interfaces (APIs).
